description: Amendments to planning permission dated 28th October 2022 (RN: 22/04598/FULL) for Alterations to the building including installation of a new shopfront; infilling of the lightwell at rear lower ground and ground floor levels, extension at rear fourth floor level, creation of terrace areas at rear first, fourth and fifth floor levels; installation of a high level extract on the rear elevation, new plant with associated screening and PV panels at main roof level; replacement windows; and associated external works. Use of part ground and basement floors as retail, restaurant or office (Class E). Namely, proposed amendments including the size and location of a number of windows shown on the south and rear elevations, the coping stones added around the terraces, the fire protection treatment of the staircore, the extent of the render finish shown on the south and rear elevations, the inclusion of the rear escape staircase at lower ground level and an escape stair at roof level, the number of rooflights shown on the first-floor terrace and a slightly different roof configuration.
